import React from 'react';
import { Box, Grid, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core';
import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms';

export default function Example() {
  return (
    <Box marginBottom={2} padding={2} border="1px solid #ccc" borderRadius="4px">
      <HeroBackground>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12}>
            <Typography variant="h3" style={{ color: 'white', fontWeight: 900, }}>
                Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Typography variant="h5" style={{ color: 'white' }} gutterBottom>
                Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners.
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="h5" style={{ color: 'white' }}>
                Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020.
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Button variant="contained">Download exhibitor overview</Button>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </HeroBackground>
    </Box>
  );
}

        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12}>

                Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020

}

import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, Typography, Button, colors } from '@material-ui/core'; import { Headline, CodeHighlighter, PropsHighlighter, SectionBox } from '../../components'; import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms'; const importCodeString = ` import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms'; // or import HeroBackground from 'components/organisms/HeroBackground'; `; const dataProperties = [{ name: 'backgroundColor', type: 'string', default: '', description: 'Background color of the hero', }, { name: 'backgroundImg', type: 'string', default: '', description: 'Background image of the hero', }, { name: 'backgroundPosition', type: 'string', default: '', description: 'Background position of the hero', }, { name: 'children', type: 'node', default: '', description: 'Children to placed inside the hero', }, { name: 'contentSectionClassName', type: 'string', default: '', description: 'Custom classes for the content section', }, { name: 'disbaleCoverOpacity', type: 'bool', default: '', description: 'Should disable here cover opacity', }, { name: 'className', type: 'string', default: '', description: 'External classes', }]; const exampleCode1 = ` import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms'; export default function Example() { return ( Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020. ); } `; const exampleCode2 = ` import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, Typography, Button, colors } from '@material-ui/core'; import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms'; export default function Example() { return ( Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020. ); } `; const exampleCode3 = ` import React from 'react'; import { Box, Grid, Typography, Button, colors } from '@material-ui/core'; import { HeroBackground } from 'components/organisms'; export default function Example() { return ( Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020. ); } `; const HeroBackgroundExample = ({ ...rest }) => (
<> Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020. <> Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020. <> Join the world's leading companies at TheFront 2020 Whether it’s Porsche, Stripe, Intercom, Amazon, or Google, something about TheFront works for our global partners. Want more information? Download our overview and a member of our specialist team will be in touch to talk about your goals for TheFront 2020.
); export default HeroBackgroundExample;
